title: Rivers Of Living Water
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c v4 c v5 c

v1: Rivers that flow from the throne,
v3: Cleanse me, oh, cleanse me, my Savior,
Empty me, fill me and use me,
Teach me to trust and obey.
v4: Then, and then only, Lord Jesus,
Through me the rivers can flow;
Thus and thus only will others
Learn Thy great fulness to know.
v5: Here I lay all at His feet;
Just for His service made meet!
c1: Send now the rivers through me.
